title: 【1.6~1.8]Lithos 完美的原版高清！【32x】
author: 紫罗兰祝福
txt_content:
本帖最后由 星之永恒 于 2015-4-25 18:32 编辑 

前言

Lithos 原名为Lithos Core材质，是一款精美的原版高清材质。
原文：
一些Minecraft的基础纹理不太好看；
eleazzaar的材质包旨在弥补Minecraft的基础纹理。
看似基于原来的Minecraft的纹理，
被提升到一个更清洁的32倍分辨率的材质包
Lithos将保持相同的感觉
Minecraft同时添加一些额外的东西来提高你的原版的纹理。
以及改变游戏中的所有纹理外观也改变了生物的纹理，
在大多数情况下的变化是很微妙的，
难以察觉，
但他们很和谐。
To some the base textures of Minecraft look nice but are just a little off; Eleazzaar’s Lithos pack seeks to remedy this. With textures seemingly based upon the original Minecraft textures that have been buffed to a cleaner 32x resolution the pack will keep the same feel as vanilla minecraft while adding a little something extra to enhance your experience. As well as changing all the textures in the game Lithos also changes the mob textures, in most cases the changes are very subtle and hardly noticeable, but altogether they tie the pack together very well.

欣赏完毕
